Visit keep-web.com on your computer and copy texts from pc to your phone clipboard
Backup and restore your encrypted passwords and notes on a secure restore server
Lock when the app is put in the background
Move image from phone to KeepSafe
Copy image from phone to KeepSafe

The security of your personal information is extremely important. We take the following precoutions to make sure it cannot be accessed or altered: \n - Data encrypted in transit using HTTPS for all service calls. \n - Data encypted in storage and database to a secure server.
The only required information is your email in case you want to backup your passwords and notes to a secure restore server.
